text.title: A Robust Fuzzy Optimization Model for Closed-Loop Supply Chain Networks Considering Sustainability
text.author: Xin Zhang, Gang Zhao, Yingxiu Qi, Botang Li
text.head: 5. Mathematical Model
text.p: According to the above description and assumption of the problem, the mathematical model for a CLSCN considering sustainability will be presented in detail. These formulations are developed by extending previous works (mainly).
